// frontend/src/components/Dashboard/Sources/SourceDetails.js import React from 'react'; const SourceDetails = ({ source, onBack, onEdit }) => { const formatDate = (dateString) => { if (!dateString) return 'Rolling Deadline'; return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); }; const getTypeBadgeClass = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'government': return 'type-badge type-government'; case 'private_foundation': return 'type-badge type-foundation'; case 'corporate': return 'type-badge type-corporate'; case 'community': return 'type-badge type-community'; default: return 'type-badge type-foundation'; } }; const getStatusBadgeClass = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'status-badge status-active'; case 'upcoming': return 'status-badge status-upcoming'; case 'closed': return 'status-badge status-closed'; default: return 'status-badge status-active'; } }; const getMatchScoreClass = (score) => { if (score >= 90) return 'match-score-display high'; if (score >= 80) return 'match-score-display medium'; return 'match-score-display low'; }; const getTypeText = (type) => { const types = { 'government': 'Government Agency', 'private_foundation': 'Private Foundation', 'corporate': 'Corporate Giving', 'community': 'Community Fund' }; return types[type] || type; }; return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Profile Header */}

{source.name}

{getTypeText(source.type)}
{source.category}
Deadline: {formatDate(source.deadline)}
{getTypeText(source.type)} {source.status}
{source.matchScore}% Match
{source.amount}
Funding Range
{formatDate(source.lastUpdated)}
Last Updated
{/* Tabs Navigation */}
{/* Overview Tab Content */}
{/* Source Details */}

Source Details

{source.name}
{getTypeText(source.type)}
{source.category}
{source.amount}
{formatDate(source.deadline)}
{source.status}
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Information

Visit Website
{source.contactEmail}
{source.matchScore}%
{/* Focus Areas */}

Focus Areas & Priorities

{source.focusAreas && source.focusAreas.length > 0 ? ( source.focusAreas.map((area, index) => ( {area} )) ) : (

No focus areas specified.

)}
{/* Eligibility & Notes */}

Eligibility Requirements

{source.eligibility || 'No specific eligibility requirements provided.'}

Additional Notes

{source.notes || 'No additional notes provided.'}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default SourceDetails;
